articles.title: Asian Pupil Sent to School Nurse's Office for Coughing Amid Coronavirus Fears, California Mother Says
articles.description: An investigation has been launched into the alleged incident, which took place at Walter Reed Middle School.
articles.content:
A student of Asian descent in California claims he was sent to his school nurse's office just for coughing amid the coronavirus pandemic.
